summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from August 13, 2019, discussing an impending New York Times report alleging that personnel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) falsified records, likely in relation to Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death.

events.title: Impending NY Times Report on MCC Record Falsification
events.description: An email indicates that the New York Times will report, possibly as early as that night, that personnel at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) falsified records.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 13, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.
It references an impending New York Times report alleging that MCC personnel falsified records.
The timing suggests the falsified records are directly related to the circumstances of Epstein's incarceration and death.
